name: Gift Voucher - $200.00
description:
The perfect gift for that woman in your life who has everything: a love&lustre gift voucher.

Simply choose a value to suit your budget, add to cart, checkout and we will sent you a unique code for the recipient to use.

Value: $200

Voucher details will be emailed to buyer.
We can personalise the voucher, as required.
To be redeemed online only at loveandlustre.com.au 
Please contact katie@loveandlustre.com.au with any queries.

name: LL714 Stripe robe - coral
description:
Knee length wrap around robe with belt and flat front pockets.
Perfect over your favourite nightdress around the house or in hospital.
Lightweight and breathable knitted Pima Cotton / Micro Modal blend is a premium, soft, all-natural fabric and is perfect all year round.

Fabrication: 50% Pima Cotton 50% Micro Modal
Colours: Black with white or Coral with white
Sizes: 8 - 10, 12 - 14

Everyday hipster knicker with cheeky coverage, trimmed with lace.
Fits flat against the body like a second skin, perfect under every outfit for a smooth finish. 
Crafted from lightweight and quick-drying Microfibre, ideal for travel and everyday.

Fabrication: 91% Nylon, 9% Elastane with Cotton gusset
Trim: scalloped lace on waist and legs.
Colours: Black, Ivory, Nude
Sizes: 8 - 14 (previously 1 - 4)
Please check FAQ for size chart.

For further product, stockist and availability information please email info@loveandlustre.com.au

name: Gift Voucher - $150.00
